name: Joseph J. Blake and Associates Reviews

review.title: “Good”
review.pros: Pros – The level of professionalism associated with the group was high. A number of people took ownership for their work product and this was nice.
review.cons: Cons – Upper management was zealous about protecting their cleint base and growth within th company was somewhat limited as a result.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Invest money within the company systems and employees to allow for growth within the platform thereby allowing for the group across all levels to grow.

review.title: “I had a good overall experience while at JJBlake.”
review.pros: Pros – Small staff allows everyone to get to know each other. Also, the manager is very experienced and very good at sharing insights and developing staff.
review.cons: Cons – Internal software system does not allow for truly efficient sharing of market information between associates.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Further development of information sharing of real estate data within company/office.
